textContent:
DurableSubsciption : 
Nats create a record  listing all the durable subscritpiton internaly inside the channel we are subscribing to, so we can tell if the event has been processed or not.
It keeps a copy of all the event that the service hasnt processed 
so when the service with exact same id is back event are sent again 

setDeliverAllAvaible() is still required for keeping all event that occurs
title: setDurableName('')
textContentHtml:
DurableSubsciption : 

Nats create a record  listing all the durable subscritpiton internaly inside the channel we are subscribing to, so we can tell if the event has been processed or not.

It keeps a copy of all the event that the service hasnt processed 

so when the service with exact same id is back event are sent again 


setDeliverAllAvaible() is still required for keeping all event that occurs
